## Your TJ'S Guide to Turkey Roasting

Roasting a turkey for the Big Meal can be intimidating... but it doesn’t have
to be! All you have to do is follow our step-by-step Turkey Roasting Guide.
When you do, you’ll not only have a boast-worthy bird, but you’ll also be
considered (by us) a certified Trader Joe’s Roastmaster...

LET'S BEGIN!

# Welcome to Trader Joe's!

## Podcast

###

Past ‘Casts

## Believe-Eat-Or-Not Recipes

Yum!

### Unexpected Cheddar Cheese Board

We’re adding an unexpected twist to the social media-celebrated butter board
by swapping out butter for our equally celebrated **Trader Joe’s Unexpected
Cheddar Spread**. This spread is a combo of our crumbly **Unexpected Cheddar**
, salted butter, and whey that that brings a whole lot of complexity and
downright deliciousness to this simple-to-assemble, showstopping appetizer.
Follow the recipe or use it as a guide to craft your own cheesy creation.  

Serves 6 - 8Time 10 mins

Delish!

### Mashed Sweet Potatoes with Brown Butter

Within each bag of **Trader Joe’s Mashed Sweet Potatoes** is just one simple
ingredient: sweet potatoes that have been peeled, cooked, and mashed, then
frozen into portioned pucks. That’s it—nothing else added, all the prep work
done, ready to use whenever you need them. Their sweet, earthy flavor shines
in this simple, yet impressive holiday side that gets its incredible depth and
alluring aroma from brown butter, made with **Trader Joe’s Unsalted Butter
Quarters**.

**Pro-tip** : Double the brown butter recipe and spread it on toast, spoon it
over oatmeal, or toss it with a bowl of popcorn!  

Serves 4Time 20 mins

So. Good.

### Grandmommy's Gravy

This is an heirloom family gravy recipe that's been handed down for four
generations. Made simpler with **Trader Joe's Mirepoix** (an essential soup-
and sauce-starter comprised of conveniently chopped carrots, celery and
onions), the base of this rich gravy calls for a roux (say "ROO"). It's a
mixture of fat and flour used to thicken soups, stews, gravy and other velvety
sauces. Proceed with caution: one taste and you'll be tempted to slurp this
Southern classic right out of the gravy boat.  

Serves 6 - 8Time 45 mins

see more recipes

### Side Quest

November 13, 2023

Well met, weary wanderer! With the Feast of Thanksgiving nigh on the horizon,
you may find yourself at something of a crossroads. For those who could use a
bit of help deciding which sides to serve, we invite you to embark on the
Trader Joe’s Side Quest! Simply answer these questions to see which TJ's
Beverages, Starches, Veggies, and Sweets will best fit your Thanksgiving
table.

## Read It & Eat

  1. ### Easy-peasy Pasta Night

As weather cools and the season's routines fall into place, we all have a lot
on our plates, figuratively speaking. That can make getting food on our
(literal) plates a bit of a challenge. Cue the pasta offerings at your
neighborhood Trader Joe’s! Check out these recipes for timesaving shortcuts,
inspired swap-ins, and terrifically tasty hacks.

October 2, 2023

  2. ### Fearless Eats Back to School Snacks

Our faithful spokes-puppet has flown to his neighborhood Trader Joe’s to pick
up some very special Back-to-School Snacks! Fearless’s haul has it all, from
savory bites to sweet treats and everything in between. Watch the videos for
Fearless’s recommendations and ratings, then check out your neighborhood
Trader Joe’s to try them for yourself!

August 7, 2023

Guide to... Everything
